synopsis.text: Wendelin Von Benno Baumeister, once a typical 25-year-old corporate employee named Ichinomiya Shingo, wakes up to find himself in the body of a six-year-old boy. Trapped in a foreign world, Wendelin discovers he is now the youngest child of an impoverished noble family residing in a remote countryside. Struggling with his new reality, Wendelin realizes that he lacks the necessary skills to manage his family's vast estate. However, he soon uncovers an extraordinary talent for magic, which could potentially bring wealth and prestige to his family. Unfortunately, Wendelin's unique gift has only brought hardship thus far. Follow Wendelin's journey as he navigates the treacherous world of nobility and strives to create a prosperous life using his unparalleled magical abilities.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
